## Feature Description
Clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? Is it related to a frustration?

## Proposed Solution
How would you like this to work?

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions?

## Use Case
Describe your use case or provide examples.

## Implementation Ideas
(Optional) Technical suggestions for implementation.

## Additional Context
Screenshots, mockups, links to similar features, etc.

## Checklist
- [ ] I've checked existing issues for duplicates
- [ ] I've considered if this could be a site configuration instead of a code change
- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this (optional but appreciated!)
